title: How do we delete an update on Goodreads? - Quora

response.answer_text: from the help section on their website: To remove a status update (progress update) from Goodreads: Navigate to the book page with which your status update is associatedScroll down to the My Activity sectionClick on Show more under StatusClick on the percentage to the right of the update you'd like to deleteOn the resulting page, click on Delete this status update at the top rightGoodreads Help
